plot: The magical music box invites few people to meditate on their dreams and desires. The box eventually passes from one person to another showing that all of the characters have the same pains and desires.
title: Zivot uspavanih secanja
plot_es: The magical music box invites few people to meditate on their dreams and desires. The box eventually passes from one person to another showing that all of the characters have the same pains and desires.
plot_en: The magical music box invites few people to meditate on their dreams and desires. The box eventually passes from one person to another showing that all of the characters have the same pains and desires.
